attributes.action: Ban the sale of plastic bags in the U.K. In exchange for reusable bags.
attributes.additional_details: A recent study had shown that plastic was found in human poo across the globe. Finland, Italy, Japan, the Netherlands, Poland, Russia, the UK and Austria all tested positive for microplastics.
attributes.background: The use of single plastic bags have increased rapidly over the past decade. Globally 8 million metric tons of plastic trash leak into our natural spaces each year, slowly destroying our planet. Plastic is killing the wildlife on land and in the ocean.
